string.text: Impierskaj Šlachty
Vašyja baćki addana słužyli hrafu Haŭpt-Andersanu, jany nie byli bujnymi šlachcičami, ale zajmali značnaje stanovišča pry pałacy Hrafa-Elektara i zabiaśpiečyli vam kamfortnaje dziacinstva.
Impierskaha Siaržanta
Vašy baćka nia tolki ŭdała słužyŭ, ale i vyžyvaŭ dosyć doŭha, kab atrymać pasadu siaržanta, vieterana, što pralivaŭ kroŭ jak źvieraludziej, hetak i bandytaŭ.
Złačyncy
Nie ŭsio ŭ Impieryi błasłaŭlonyja Ranaldam, vašaja siamja była biednaj i zarablała na žyćcio chutkimi rukami i kiemlivaściu. Jana krała maniety z adkrytych kišeniaŭ i zasoŭvali ich u svaje.
Prostyja Ludzi
Vino - kroŭ Vurtbada. Vašaja siamja zarablała na jaho handli vyšej pa race Šcir i ŭsioj Impieryi. Vašaje malenstva było źviazana sa stałymi vandroŭkami.
Dałučyŭsia da Rušeńnia
Źvieraludy i bandyty kvitniejuć u Impieryi. Tamu vašy dom zaŭždy mieŭ patrebu ŭ dužych mužčynach. U rychtoŭlach z rušeńniem vy nieŭzabavie zdabyli mocnyja ruki i hust da bojki.
Pamahaty Handlara

Handlar, što prajazžaŭ la vašaj chaty, zaŭvažyŭ vašyja zdolnaści da ličbaŭ i ŭziaŭ vas pad svajo kryło. Jon prapanavaŭ navučyć vas svajmu ramiastvu ŭ pamien na štodzionnuju dapamohu ŭ vykanańni jaho zadańniaŭ.
Vučań Kavala

Kanflikty ŭ Impieryi nie spynialisia ni na chvilinu, jak i praca jaje kavaloŭ. Pad kiraŭnictvam miascovaha kavala vy vyrašyli pieratvaryć svaju siłu ŭ ramiastvo i stali kuć žaleza pa svajmu žadańniu. Vašy pieršy mieč, chacia i atrymaŭsia kryvym, ale zatoje vostrym!
Impierski Kultyst
Bolšuju častku času vy bavili ŭ chramavym rajonie i malilisia roznym baham Impierskaha Panteona. Niekatoryja z tamtejšych śviataroŭ źviarnuli na vas svaju ŭvahu i stali vučyć vas svaim pisańniam.
Student Inžyniera
Historyi pra Kalehii Nulna zaŭždy byli vašymi ŭpadabanymi, zdajecca, Ranald błasłaviŭ vas, kali Majstar-Inžynier, jaki šukaŭ vučnia, vyrašyŭ, što vy budziecie idealnym kandydatam.
Rušenny Volnaj Kampanii

Bojki i vypiŭka - što jašče treba ŭ žyćci? Z miačom u ruce vy maršavali sa svajoj raznašersnaj Volnaj Kampanijaj ad bitvy da bitvy i zarablali svaju ščyruju dolu šnaraŭ. Vy hatovyja słužyć kožnamu šlachciču za adpaviedny košt.
Vučań Mahistra
Zdolnaści da Viatroŭ Mahii dazvolili vam zaniać miesca ŭ Kalehijach Altdorfa, z časam vy navučylisia karystacca asnovami svajoj siły i paznali naturu svajho vietru.
Akalit Śviatara

Pryśviaciŭšy žyćcio kultu svajho boha-zastupnika, vy šukajecie šlach praviednaści ŭ adpaviednaści sa svajoj vieraj. Być Akalitam - značyć hartavać siabie suprać zła, nienaturalnaha i žachlivaha (Daje dostup da Malitvaŭ, ale nie daje vučyć Zaklony).
Inicyjant Palaŭničaha na Viadźmarak

Jeraś była bizunom dobrych ludziej Impieryi, hniłatoj, ad jakoj treba było pazbavicca. Vyvučajučy majsterstva Palaŭničych na Viadźmarak, vy rychtavalisia sustrecca z usimi vidami niazbožnych źviaroŭ i mahaŭ, z vieraj i srebram.
U Impieryi šmat handlovych tavaraŭ, i vy vyrašyli zaniać svajo miesca siarod šmatlikich handlaroŭ. Na zaaščadžanyja hrošy vy źbirajeciesia stvaryć svoj ułasny karavan i zrabić sabie imia.
Šlachietnyja Vyhnańniki
Słavalubstva zahubiła mnohich, i vašaja siamja apynułasia nie ŭ litaści z Elektaram. Vyhnanaja ŭ Silvaniju z drobnym bahaćciem, vašaja siamja była vymušana žyć siarod viaskoŭcaŭ.
Stryhanskija Karavańniki
Vy naradzilisia ŭ siamji Stryhanaŭ. Vašaje dziacinstva prajšło ŭ padarožžach z horada ŭ horad razam z karavanam kłana.
Mahilnyja Hrabiežniki

U Silvanii majucca tyja, chto dobra płacić za trupy, i vašaja siamja vybrała mienavita hetaje ramiastvo. Vykradali kachanych ludziej hłubokaj nočču i vieźli ich u zamki ci trymańni šlachty, nikoli nie zadajučy sabie pytańnie, navošta toje patrebna.

Na praciahu šmatlikich pakaleńniaŭ vašaja siamja łaviła rybu ŭ rekach i bahnavych łužynach, kab pracharčavacca. Heta było daloka nie bahataje žyćcio, ale heta była sumlennaja praca, i vašaja siamja była zadavolena. Navat paśla źniknieńnia vašaha brata...

Vy nikoli nia viedali pra svaju siamju, chacia mnohija hladzieli na vas sa stracham i šaptalisia napaŭhołasu, i vam zastavałasia tolki zmahacca za vyžyvańnie, zdabyvać sabie pražytak i siłkavacca čužymi zjedkami. Vam časta davadziłasia chavacca ad stvareńniaŭ, što chavajucca ŭnačy.
Pamahaty Šlachciča
Słužba ŭ pałacy fon Karštajnaŭ dała vam ujaŭleńnie pra pobyt viečna žyvych, a chitrasplacieńni i palityki šlachty navučyli vas mnohamu. Vašaja starannaść dapamahła vam vyžyć i pačuvacca kamfortna.
Vučań Niekramanta

Pra ćviarozy rozum vašaha majstara nielha šmat skazać: usie jaho dni byli pryśviečany raskryćciu skrutkaŭ i praviadzieńniu ciomnych rytuałaŭ. Apantany žadańniem stać mahutnym, ale nia majučy takoj mahčymaści, jon imknuŭsia karystacca vašymi zdolnaściami dziela ŭzmacnieńnia ŭłasnych.
Tarfiany Ziemlarob
Kapańnie bahnavaj hleby z brudnymi adkidami - nialohki zaniatak. Ale heta dazvalała vam i vašaj vioscy źbirać biedny ŭradžaj z prydatnych dla ziemlarobstva ziemlaŭ.
Zakličnik Rušeńnia

Zaklikany ŭ vojska svajho majstara, vy praviali svajo junactva na poli boju. Vajujučy razam z žachami niežyci i niekratyčnymi brydotami. Ale vy niejkim čynam zastalisia žyvyja i možacie raskazać pra hetaje.
Stryhanski Hojsak
Hojsajučy pa ŭskrajkam łahieraŭ, vy padhladvali lohkija zdabyčy i maładych dziaŭčyn dy, karystaliś svaimi spakuślivymi i debašyrskimi pavodzinami, kab zajmacca ramiastvom.
Vampir-Šlachcič

U niejki momant vašy vaładar raspaznaŭ vašyja jakaści, vyvieŭ vas z halečy i adkryŭ svaju sapraŭdnuju isnaść. Paśla pacałunka kryvi vy adradzilisia, zrabilisia nieśmiarotnym i bolš mahutnym. - Daje zdolnaść vyvučać zaklony i ŭzdymać miortvych paśla boju i na mohiłkach. Napačatku hulni vy musicie abrać kreŭnuju liniju.

Niečakana zjaviłasia mahčymaść skraści staražytny falijant viedaŭ. Tak vy stali na šlach niekramantyi - Daje dostup da zaklonaŭ, vykliku kaściakoŭ i zdolnaści ŭzdymać miortvych paśla boju ci na mohiłkach.
Načny Vartaŭnik

Śmiarotnych časta zaklikajuć słužyć svaim miortvym majstram. Zrazumieła, što hetyja prafiesijnyja vajary iduć u boj razam z proćmaj niežyci svaich majstraŭ. Bolš panurych i zababonnych ludziej składana sustreć, ale jany redka łamajucca ŭ zapału bitvy.
Stryhanski Donmu

Chacia Donmu nie ŭpłyvovyja ŭ paraŭnańni z matryjarchami svajho kłanu, jany zjaŭlajucca važnymi čalcami hramadstva Stryhanaŭ. Bo padtrymlivajuć zhurtavanaść siamji i zjaŭlajucca tvaram kłana padčas kamunikavańnia z čužyncami. Chacia jany nia zjaŭlajucca prafiesijnymi vajarami, ich šmathadovaja praca na čale karavanaŭ u Starym Śviecie nie daje nahody dla pahardy nad imi.

Darohi Silvanii ciomnyja i niebiaśpiečnyja, vy palujecie na jaje małalikich vandraŭnikoŭ i zabirajecie sabie toje małaje bahaćcie, jakoje možacie zabrać svaim lazom. Ale vy nie adzinaja pačvara, jakaja chavajecca ŭ ciomnych bahnach i lasach: časam ad padarožnikaŭ nie zastajecca ničoha, što lha skraści.
Bretońskaja Šlachta

Vašaja siamja moža prasačyć svaje karani i suviazi amal da časoŭ Žyla. Vy naradzilisia ŭ Bretońskim šlachiectvie, i ŭsie viedajuć pra hetaje pa tym, jak vy apranajeciesia, jak kažacie i jak zahadvajecie viaskovym.
Bretońskija Pryhonnyja

Na praciahu šmatlikich pakaleńniaŭ vašaja siamja apracoŭvała ziamlu svajho fieadała. Vašy baćka daŭno pierastaŭ sprabavać zrazumieć słovy šlachciča i prosta źviartajecca da Jomena, jaki zaŭždy prychodzić da jaho z zahadami, jakija zvyčajna źviazany z ciažkaj fizičnaj pracaj.
Bretońskija Morachody

Vašy baćka byŭ morachodam na Bretońskim karabli Bukańjer. Paśla viartańnia ŭ vašuju rybackuju viosku, jon pravodziŭ jak maha bolš času z vašymi maci, bratami i siostrami. Baćka navučyŭ vas mnohim navykam: viazańniu vuzłoŭ, vykarystańniu padzornaj truby i ŭmieńniu aryjentavacca pa načnym niebie.
Złačyncy

Čamuści vašaja siamja parušyła adnu z klatvaŭ, što dała svajmu šlachciču, i z tych časoŭ jaje ličać złačynnaj. Jak vynik vašaja siamja zadavolvajecca tym, što atrymoŭvajecca zdabyć u lasach, bo ŭvieś čas znachodzicca ŭva ŭciokach i žyvie na zavuhollach hramadstva.
Vinnyja Handlary

Vašaja siamja naležała da vielmi abmiežavanaha koła viaskoŭcaŭ, što žyvie ŭ Bretońnii. Jany nažyvali svajo bahaćcie na praciahu šmatlikich pakaleńniaŭ praz prodaž Bretońskich vinaŭ u Impieryju, Istaliju i Cileju. Niadaŭna vašy šlachcič zrabiŭ vyklučeńnie z zakonaŭ pra bahaćcie. Toje dazvoliła vam nasić boty, što dachodziać da kalen.
Bretoński Pałacavy
Ciaham šmatlikich hadoŭ vas rychtavali stać lepšaj šlachtaj Bretońnii. Uroki manier, vieršnictva i rycarstva.
Zbrojny Čyn
Kali vy dasiahnuli paŭnalećcia, vy pastupili na słužbu da svajho šlachciča. Vas vučyli trymać liniju i vyžyvać na poli boju jak maha lepš. Vy dahetul žyvyja, to bok, u vas niadrenna atrymvajecca.
Złačynca ŭ Vyšuku

U maładzionstvie vy parušyli adzin sa šmatlikich zakonaŭ, što vyznačaje miežy Bretoński hramadstva. Nia majučy inšaha vyjścia, vy apynulisia na zavuholli hramadstva, viečna chavajučysia ad ułady. Peŭny čas vy žyli vyklučna brakańjerstvam i kradziažom, ale ŭrešcie znajšli prabačeńnie za svaje złačynstvy.
Vučań Ramieśnika

Vašy baćka zmoh uładkavać vas u vučni da adnaho z miascovych ramieśnikaŭ. Ciaham piaci hadoŭ majstar vučyŭ vas usiamu, što mieŭ, i ŭ vyniku vy nabyli navyki, jakija nazaŭždy pastavili vas vyšej za zvyčajnych viaskoŭcaŭ.
Šepard

Vy stali pastuchom, jaki dahladaŭ za žyviołaj, ad jakoj zaležali ježa i adzieńnie. Vy i vašyja siabry, vykonvali dźvie roli: baranili statki ad vaŭkoŭ i inšych drapiežnikaŭ, a taksama sačyli za ŭskrainami vioski na pradmiet zjaŭleńnia zachopnikaŭ.
Vandroŭny Rycar

Vy vyrašyli stać na šlach rycara Bretońnii. Daroha šlachietnaha rycarstva ciažkaja - vas čakaje mnostva vorahaŭ i bitvaŭ. Ale kali vy budziecie hodnyja, to naprykancy svajoj vandroŭki atrymajecie najvialikaje z viadomych ludziam dabrasłavieńniaŭ - hłotak z Hraala Łedzi.
Cnatliŭka Łedzi

Napačatku vašaha žyćcia Čaradziejka Fej naviedała vašuju siamju i zabrała vas da siabie. Jana ŭbačyła ŭ vas vialiki patencyjał, i vy dałučylisia da inšych jaje vučanic. Paśla doŭhich hadoŭ navučańnia jana paličyła vas hatovym rušyć u darohu, kab słužyć voli Łedzi.
Vy daviali svajmu šlachciču svaju vartaść, i jon uznaharodziŭ vas tytułam Jomena. Tytuł daŭ vam prava kiravać inšymi viaskoŭcami, a ŭ rušeńniach vy musili brać na siabie rolu Najeźnika.
Volny Čałaviek

Dziakujučy voli pierasoŭvańnia i imknieńniu da samaŭdaskanaleńnia, vy nikoli nie byli va ŭładzie šlachciča i zmahli rabić štości svajo. Majučy peŭny navyk u ramiastvie ci pośpiech u handli vy dahetul možacie stać viaskoŭcam, vartym vyzvaleńnia ad padatkaŭ.
Nahladnik Ściany

Peŭny čas vy byli vučniem Nahladnika Ściany. Vy dapamahali jamu vyznačać škodu i padtrymlivać zamak svajho šlachciča ŭ paradku. Kali vašy nastaŭnik byŭ zabity padčas šturmu zamkavych ścien, vy stali Nahladnikam Ściany. Adnak paśla maleńkaj pamyłki vašy šlachcič vyzvaliŭ vas ad abaviazkaŭ, kab znajści kahości bolš daśviedčanaha.
Mousillan Nobility

You parents were of the ‘Nobility in Mousillon, if they can be called that. Nobles here are mostly made up of outlawed Bretonnian nobles, exiles and rouges from other nations, vampires, mummies and other varied monstrosities. While certainly at the top of Mousillan society, outside of the blighted land they are looked down upon the same as anyone else from here.
Mousillan Yeoman

Your father was a Yeoman for one of the lords in the cursed dukedom. His position was one of the few that ensured your family dry lodgings and decent food, most of the time. When he was not on campaign he would do his best to teach you some fighting skills.
Bog Smuggler

Trade in and out of Mousillon is nearly impossible due to the Cordon Sanitaire. Despite this, your family became skilled at smuggling goods past the gates and their guards. While not wealthy by most standards, for Mousillon you certainly were born with a silver spoon.
Peat Farmer and his Frogwife

Somehow, your family broke one of the oath bonds to your lord and has since been branded as outlaws. Constantly on the run and living at the fringe of society, your family makes due with what they can poach from the forests.

One of the most common professions of Mousillon, your family was a rough bunch, who used their strength and wits to take advantage of the many weak and foolish people you found yourself living amongst.
Mousillan Courtier
For years, you were groomed to be the best Mousillan noble you could be. This included lessons in manners, horsemanship and chivalry.
Student of Witchcraft
Witchcraft and Magic is rife in Mousillon. You became a student of one of these practitioners and worked on brews and potions until you were trusted to learn more arcane knowledge.
Mousillan Man-at-Arms

When you came of age, you entered the service of your lord. You were trained to hold the line and survive on the battlefield the best you can. You are still alive now, so you must have been pretty good at it.

You spent your time hunting frogs and snails in the swamps and bogs to support your family. It is a tricky task that requires some skill and quickness to your fingers but snails and frogs are one of the few resources that your land is rich in.

Waiting along the high roads and near ferries, you made a living ambushing passersby and demanding their possessions. It is not an easy life, but youd rather lead your own life than those of your victims
Mousillan Errant Knight
Nothing says that a man of Mousillon cannot walk the path of a Bretonnian Knight. Where that path leads is as always reliant on the will and purity of the individual who walks it.
Vampire of Mousillon
The swamps prevent the land of chivalry from exerting their control over the cursed dukedom, as a result many nerdowells find a kind of sanctuary in Mousillon, even the lords of the night.
Witches and Warlocks, Hedgefolk and Daemonologists, Wisewomen and Strigany; In a nearly lawless and accursed land such as Mousillon, whats one more who defies the will of Morr?
Cordon Runner

Things arrive in Mousillon that would be confiscated in any other port of the Oldworld. Wyrdstone, strange drugs, slaves, stolen goods, pirated ships and much much more and far darker. Someone has to take these items to their arranged buyers, who are almost always located outside of Mousillon. That means, you need someone who can get these items past the Cordon Sanitaire
Bog Pirate

The Foggy river heads and boggy bays of Mousillon make great hideouts for those of a less than legitimate profession. Bretonnian vessels are some of the best in the world, and are often laden with fabulous and valuable goods. That these vessels often have to ply the waters of the coast of Mousillon creates many opportunities for those willing to ‘seize them.
Student of Daith

You were taken under the wing of Daith, the master smith of the Asrai. Under his tutelage, you learned the secrets of forging enchanted weapons and armor. Your skills in crafting are matched only by your prowess in battle, making you a formidable warrior and a skilled artisan.
Survivor of the Forest
You were raised by the forest. It took decades, until you got in touch with other Asrai. While you only slowly adapted to the Asrai society, you learned to speak to the forest itself.
Veteran of Mountain Conflicts

You have faced the hardy Dwarfs in numerous skirmishes in the Grey Mountains surrounding Athel Loren. Your experiences in these rugged battles have honed your skills and resilience, making you a more endurant warrior of the forest than most.
Minor Noble of Athel Loren

Born into a minor noble family of Athel Lorens halls, you were raised with the finest education and training under the Green Way. Your noble lineage afforded you the best tutors in both combat and diplomacy.
Guardian of Anmyr

Anmyr, the Witherhold, is a blighted and festering realm, tainted by Morghurs foul blood. As a result, Beastmen raiding parties flock to Anmyr like a moth to a flame. You are one of the Asrai that always responded to Anmyrs call to arms with zeal and a strong sense of duty. Witherhold will not fall to vile beasts!
Kurnous, the Hunter

The god of the hunt and wild realms in the Elven Pantheon. All Elves revere him but Kurnous is dearest to the Wood Elves, who consider the god of the hunt the father of their race and believe their way of life is the most aligned with the ways of Kurnous.
Isha, the Mother

The Elven goddess of nature, fertility, bountiful harvest, and the protector of the all things natural. Wood Elves firmly believe the Asrai Mage-Queen Ariel is a living avatar of Isha, bringing her will into the realm of mortals.
Loec, the Shadow Dancer

The god of trickery, laughter, and music, as well as a patron to Asrai Wardancers. Loec is a mysterious deity, as his servants guard the secrets of his rituals. The Trickster-Gods followers are famous for performing intricate dances that retell the history of Athel Loren. Loec also holds a darker side as the god of shadows, stealth, and vengeance.
Vaul, the Maker

The Elven god of smiths, artisans, and craftsmen. Vaul was injured by Khaine during the ancient wars of the gods, which left him crippled and blind. But that doesnt stop the tenacious Smith-God, for still he labours day and night to the benefit of his kin. Some of the mightiest artifacts ever wielded came from Vauls forge, including the dreaded Widowmaker – the Sword of Khaine.
Anath Raema, the Goddess of the Savage Hunt

Anath Raema, sister to Khaine, is the dark mirror to Kurnous, a savage predator whos only interest is in spilling the blood of lesser creatures. Though she is publicly spurned in Loren some realms seek her patronage, and more Asrai than most would suspect dedicate at least a few of their kills to the Savage Huntress - All Anath Raema seeks from her followers is the death of prey, from dragons to rats, all of it pleases her.
Path of the Wardancer
You are a warrior, dancing on the path of Loec. As a Wardancer, your agility and grace in combat are unparalleled. You move with fluid precision, turning battle into a deadly dance.
Path of the Waywatcher
You are a seasoned scout, protecting and watching out for the security of the forest. You become one with your bow with unmatched prowess.
Path of the Spellsinger
You are a spellsinger, who will study the high or dark magic. You will understand the nature of this magical wood and will protect it like the mage queen herself.
Path of the Glade Rider
Asrai live with their mounts in harmony like no other. You decided in your early years to become one with your horse.
Path of the Warden
Athel Loren needs protection, even from within. As a Warden, you swear to protect the woods from any threat.
Descendant of Toriour
As a city-born, you lived most of the time in Tor Lithanel, where you learned the traditions and craftsmen-ship preserved long before the separation of your kin.
Descendant of Faniour

Your family survived the war of the beards, and escaped to the forest of Laurelorn as the last bastion of the surviving Asur in the old World. As Forestborn you spend most of your young ages in the wards of the Laurelorn forest.
Descendant of Harioth

Your Family entered the Laurelorn forest in the last millennia, long after the separation of the Eonir. You as a second generation barely survived the rite for your acceptance. You spend most of your young ages close the border of the Eonir territory, in caves and improvised shelters..
Descendant of Asur Diplomats

You originate from a family that till to this day has a high renown in Ulthuan as well as among the Eonir. Diplomats from the far Asur continent as well as todays council, often listen carefully when they hear your name.
Druchii Foundling

coast patrols of the Asur attacked a Slavership of the Druchii, while the whole crew died, they found a surviving druchii child. Not knowing what they should do with you, you were brought to the Eonir as an orphan. - As part of this trade, nobody knows where you are from, yet you are well aware what happened.
Council Guard
You were involved in matters of security of the Council. Over the years you made a name for yourself as a Captain.
Trader in imperial Towns
As a traveling trader, you know probably more humans than your own kin. You nevertheless learned how to make a name for yourself and for this you are respected by both men and elves.
Envoy to the Witch-King
The Court often send you on Missions in the far Naggaroth or their roaming Black Arks. Your regular visits gave you some insights into the daily businesses of the druchi
Member of the Senate
Your competence as a Warrior brought you a seat in the Senat, you learned the ways of diplomacy and how to enforce your policies in the Politics through the manner of speech.
Protector of the Wards
You spend most of your time in the Woods, defending the Wards against the everlasting threats of the Eonir.
Eonir Envoy
As Envoy you are serving the Eonir outside the woods, handling trade and relations with foreign kingdoms and elector states.
Ghost Strider
The silent hunters of the forest are feared by anybody who is a foe of the woods. You decided to go the path of such a deadly warrior. You decided to become a Ghost Strider.
Kithband Warrior

You fight alongside your kin, for the protection for the forest, no matter what it costs. While Kithband warriors lack a certain elegance, compared to other elves, the inventiveness and their practicality make them excellent warriors of the forest.
Greylord Apprentice

You decided to join the teachings of one of the Exiled Magic lords of Ulthuan, while they know everything of the this world, and beyond, the magicians follow a high interest in the control of dragons, no matter the cost.
Eonir Expatriate
You think the cause of the Eonir is lost. Instead, you call the provinces of the humans your home. As a mercenary or trader, you are making a living for yourself.
